item.title: deleteObject
item.description: SoftLayer_Layout_Profile_Customer::deleteObject Overview This method deletes an existing layout profile and associated custom preferences Parameters Name Type Description Required Headers authenticate SoftLayer_Layout_Profile_CustomerInitParameters Optional Headers Return Values boolean

item.title: editObject
item.description: SoftLayer_Layout_Profile_Customer::editObject Overview This method edits an existing layout profile object by passing in a modified instance of the object. Parameters Name Type Description templateObject SoftLayer_Layout_Profile_Customer A skeleton SoftLayer_Layout_Profile_Customer object with only the properties defined that you wish to change. Unchanged properties are left alone. Required Headers authenticate SoftLayer_Layout_Profile_CustomerInitParameters Optional Headers Return Values boolean

item.title: modifyPreference
item.description: SoftLayer_Layout_Profile_Customer::modifyPreference Overview This method modifies an existing associated [[SoftLayer_Layout_Profile_Preference]] object. If the preference object being modified is a default value object, a new record is created to override the default value. Only preferences that are assigned to a profile may be updated. Attempts to update a non-existent preference object will result in an exception being thrown. Parameters Name Type Description templateObject SoftLayer_Layout_Profile_Preference Required Headers authenticate SoftLayer_Layout_Profile_CustomerInitParameters Optional Headers SoftLayer_Layout_Profile_CustomerObjectMask SoftLayer_ObjectMask Return Values SoftLayer_Layout_Profile_Preference

item.title: modifyPreferences
item.description: SoftLayer_Layout_Profile_Customer::modifyPreferences Overview Using this method, multiple [[SoftLayer_Layout_Profile_Preference]] objects may be updated at once. Refer to [[SoftLayer_Layout_Profile::modifyPreference()]] for more information. Parameters Name Type Description layoutPreferenceObjects SoftLayer_Layout_Profile_Preference[] Required Headers authenticate SoftLayer_Layout_Profile_CustomerInitParameters Optional Headers SoftLayer_Layout_Profile_CustomerObjectMask SoftLayer_ObjectMask Return Values SoftLayer_Layout_Profile_Preference[]
